info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 May 2024,  路 Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Tis Airbnb exceeded my expectations in every way possible. It was a challenge to find a apartment which is safe for a foreign girl. Im glad i chose this one. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with exceptional hospitality and warmth. The apartment itself was impeccably clean, spacious, and beautifully decorated. It has a microwave, a fridge with freezer and AC's in both bedrooms. The neighbours are all welcoming and friendly. The amenities provided were top-notch, ensuring a comfortable and convenient stay. The location was ideal, with easy access to shops, restaurants, and transportation. Rana was incredibly responsive and accommodating, making sure all my needs were met throughout my stay. I highly recommend AR Residence to anyone looking for a memorable and enjoyable Airbnb experience in Dhaka. Mirpur itself is really colorful and exciting. The Metro is nearby. We often used the Metro to safe time. I will definitely book it again if i'm in Bangladesh. Thank you so Much Rana :)

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 November 2023,  路 Stayed over a week
rating_comment: a great place to stay, house was as expected clean and with ac. Rana was very helpfull and if there is something that we need we have the help of Atul the help of Rana. The neighbourhood is safe and lot of resraurants and shops. Basicly anything you need you find it. the metro is nearby.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 February 2023,  路 Stayed over a week
Rating, 5 stars,  路 January 2023,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Mr Rana was really keen to help in every aspect. It was a nice stay for us. Has a a good study environment. Stayed there for 6 nights and it was worth it. Rooms are little smaller but got our job done. Inside arambag abasik in milkvita. Mosque is very near so this was a plus for us.
Altogether we enjoyed our stay

Overall, although it was the cheapest I found It was still overpriced. Good for bachelors but Not recommended for foreign families. I felt trapped for no refunds & min 5 nights. How come everyone leaves 5 star reviews for this?
He is good person but he must need to work on airbnb minimum expected standards.
Although Mr. Rana was really very communicative & I must be grateful he got the house ready for me to move in immediately. however, the house in reality was a lot smaller, the kitchen too small to use, the bathroom flush didnt work was a little greasy, the hot water tap was taped & therefore flooded one night at 1 am, had to leave my keys so that he could fix it. crazy amount of mosquitoes, the bed & mattress was weird & dirty,the was no lounge unlike the photo, the stair was dark & its light didnt work, since no blanket had to buy one.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 January 2023,  路 Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Host was very responsive, overall a great experience

This was my 3rd Stay at Rana's Airbnb which is great experience for me as usual. During my first international travel to Dhaka he helped me a lot regarding staying in Dhaka and I am really happy and satisfied with his helpful nature. I strongly recommend this place for everyone. Will visit Soon 猴
Thanks and regards
Sonali
Kolkata, India

This was my 2nd visit.
Great service, very friendly people around.
The rooms were clean, tidy, and spacious. All the required amenities were provided. The location is very pleasing and calm too.
Highly recommended.

rating_comment: Our stay here was really comfortable. Our host was professional and very friendly. Any issues we had were solved promptly and he was available 24/7. Would definitely stay here again.

rating_comment: Amazing experience. It's the second time in this place. The hoster, Mr Rana helps with everything we need everytime. He is always there and make things easy.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 January 2020,  路 Stayed over a week
rating_comment: the house felt like home. The rooms were so well maintained. We stayed 22 days and each day we were comfortable. There was hot water, WiFi, tv, absolutely everything you need for a perfect stay. We cooked. Not to mention the host was always quick to response and made sure we were always comfortable. The staff were very helpful. The neighborhood was safe and peaceful and everything was near-by. There is absolutely nothing we can complain about. So far it was our best stay in our Airbnb experience so far. Definitely our first on the list to recommend
